32679959.review:
ZeGame to gra logiczna polegająca na dobrowadzeniu zielonego sześcianu do niebieskiego. Gra posida 8 światów ( 1 świat jest udostępniony w demie) po ok.20 poziomów. Produkt mocno korzysta z 3D, WSAD-em kierujemy a myszką zmieniamy kierunki odpowiadające klawiszom. Po ukończeniu poziomy otrzymujemy oceną w gwiazdkach (max.3), ocena zależy od czasu przescia poziomu. W demie jest pokazany najmniej urozmajcony poziom, w kolejnych wiatach dochodzą teleporty, więcej zielonych klocków itp.

Zalety:
-Ciekawa mechanika
-Dostępne demo
-Satysfakcjonująca
-Ładna grafika

Wady:
-Sterowanie może być na początku problematyczne przy szybszym przechodzeniu poziomu

31353656.review:
I initially won this game through a Twitter contest, and I was quite excited by that, because I'd been following this game's developement somewhat for quite some time. After playing it for a few hours, I gifted the game to a friend, because I liked it a lot, and I saw that he wanted it.

ZeGame is a great time killer, with challenging levels, cool mechanics, and environments which can get downright creepy. I recommend playing it with a controller if you have one, because the support is great. If you have some time to kill, ZeGame is definitely a great choice for the price.

31309021.review:
First time I have thumbed-down a game everyone else loves. I [i]tried[/i] to like this game (I like almost all puzzle games) and it says I played for two hours, but oh, it sure felt like longer: I found this game to be crazy boring! I did not find it challenging, as I spent most of my time pulling the screen around, trying to see which line on the grid my ball was in, and the rest of my time was spent going: "okay... I tried up-up-down-right, so this time I'll try up-up-down-left." The only thing I liked on this game was the music. 

It is not a [i]bad[/i] game, It's just one I did not enjoy. Wish I'd tried to demo first.

24008177.review:
From what I have played of it (which is not much so far), ZeGame is an excellent puzzle game created by the amazing Jesper the end. 

The game is beautiful, the music is relaxing, the puzzle mechanics and overall feel of the game is truly something to behold. All the elements and the style of the game cooperate perfectly with each other. 

Jesper has created a beautiful game that is truly special. If you're a fan of good puzzle games (like Antichamber, Portal 2 etc.), or of Jesper's previous works then I highly recommend this game to you.


Also the name is great, amirite?

23995762.review:
Un jeu de puzzle original et très agréable à jouer, il est aussi beau au niveau visuel que sonore.
L'éditeur de niveau est vraiment un plus, il y a toujours des niveaux à jouer, même après avoir finit tous les mondes.
Le seul petit inconvénient sont les contrôle qui changent en fonction de la position de la caméra, mais on s'y fait rapidement.
[b]Très prenant, je recommande fortement ![/b]

23821562.review: Ze harmony includets a free game :D

23653350.review: игруха офигеная!сейчас на последнем уровне уххх!!!кислотная тема)))затягивает!игра на внимательность ну и наверно немного на сообразительность.Кароче мне понравилась просто и стильно

23451808.review: Awesome game! Great that you (or should I say, I) introduced Swedish! Very needed!

23428056.review:
ZeGame was an amazing game to play.  It was clever, pretty, and overall a game that delivers from start to finish.

Pros:
-Simplistic, yet pretty
-Runs super fast, even on slower computers
-Clever puzzles that kept getting better
-Built-in level editor, allowing you to let others play your levels

Cons:
-Can be difficult at times, especially toward the end of the game

tl;dr ZeGame's worth the money.

23424520.review: Very cool game design, but the graphic effects become very distracting at the end.

23423276.review: Great game, very easy to fall into a sort of trance while playing. Awesome music and graphics.

23413157.review: It's a beautifully designed game with levels that aren't always so cut and dry. The music is lovely, the design is well done, and I tend to relax when playing it.

23328907.review:
First of all, I got this game for free as I am friends with a beta tester, but it\'s worth the 5 Euro that I didn\'t pay :P
This is similar to other 2D games, brought to life in a 3D game with much more mechanics. Each world gets progressively harder, with a new mechanic, or block, in each. The game has lovely music which is mostly relaxing and fits the game perfectly. The backgrounds also change with each world and I have to say, they are beautiful (I especially love world 4 :P ) Overall, this is a great puzzle game and I definitely recommend it.
P.S: Nearly shit myself when I saw Cthulhu\'s tentacles ;)

23304572.review:
The concept is simple and unique. The graphics are pretty much over welmed. And there is a good variety of mechanics.
The best deature is there are no loading timers. you can skip the screens if you want what.

23282274.review: I absolutely recommend this game. The learning curve is well-thought-out, the visuals and audio mix well, and the custom level editor means that there is no limit to the possible content.

23277716.review:
Easy to play, yet very challenging, it requires a lot of thinking ahead, especially the Teleporters, which add an entirely new dimension to the Game.
It's definitely a ton of fun and Id even consider it one of the best if not even the best Indie Game of 2016. 
Definitely worth its price!

23270111.review: This game is addicting. But really cool. You are a green block and you have to  get to the blue block using the white blocks. A couple of criticisms. The help that shows you the way to go isn't always accurate so you can die alot. And I would love a level selector. So my friends can play when they are on my computer.

23260214.review:
ZeGame ist ein Spiel, dass zwar sehr einfach ist, aber genau durch diese einfachheit besticht.
Man ist ein Würfel. Die einfachste Form, die es gibt!

Man bewegt sich durch W, A, S, D oder durch die Pfeiltasten fort und schaut sich mithilfe der Maus um.
Die einfaschste Tastenbelegung, die es gibt.

Neben diesen einfachen Dingen, besticht ZeGame durch seine Musik und die oftmals sehr schweren Level, die sehr oft einen wörtlichen "Perspektivenwechsel" benötigen.

[h1]Bewertung:[/h1]
Grafik: 8/10
[i]Grafik ist sehr schlicht aber dennoch schön[/i]

Level: 9/10
[list]
[*]Verschiedene Level, deren Schwierigkeitsgrad von mal zu mal schwerer werden.
[*]Angenehme Musik, die selbst nach mehrmaligem hören nicht nervig wirkt.
[*]Schöne/Interessante Effekte in manchen Leveln (Unterwasser, Gewitter, absichtliche Grafikprobleme)
[/list]

Onlinemodus/level: 7/10
[list]
[*]Level(pack)-Auswahl ist für mich etwas zu schlicht gehalten und manchmal auch unübersichtlich.
[*]Dank Betatester bietet es schon von Anfang an eine grosse Auswahl an Onlinelevel
[/list]

[h1]Gesamturteil: 8.5/10[/h1]

23254082.review:
This game is an overall plus. Even though I'm not a big puzzle-gamer, I really enjoyed this game.
I think the main thing for me is the aesthetics; the calm and soft music combined with the amazing visuals. These visuals are what a good water level in Super Mario 64 would be like, everything flows and it's smooth overall. 
If I had to rate the game while I haven't play a ton of other puzzle games yet, I would give this a true 9/10.

23249732.review: Ich bin zwar kein 100%iger Puzzle Game Fan aber dieses Game ist es auf jedan Fall wert.

23249172.review:
Such an amazing game, very cleverly thought through with puzzles blowing your mind. Nice replay values and theoretically endless fun through the level editor.

The only thing I'd probably like to change would be the reset of deaths in a level if you restart it while playing (it just feels a little unneccessary going out of the level completely to play it w/o any deaths).

Still a 10/10 puzzle game.

23248678.review:
Amazing game with beautiful graphics, great music, and incredibly creative level design! There are only two things I would change.

Firstly, I would add the option to turn down the ripples graphical effect as this can get quite distracting. Secondly, I would make the teleporter blocks easier to distinguish between because they can get confusing. Maybe adding different shades of the same colour to sets of portals.

Definitely recommended for a (very) thoughtfully designed, graphically impressive and overall great puzzle game!

23248271.review:
ZeGame is a super cool puzzle game in 3D!
In the beginning are the levels simple but it will get really hard after a while and if it is still too simple you can play it in blind mode.
And you can create your own levels and you can play levels that are made by other people.

I would recommend that you try the demo and if you think it is something for you, then you should buy it!
The music is nice but after a while it can hurt your ears a bit.

8/10

23248158.review: Dobre ćwiczenie mózgu, bardzo przyjemna oprawa graficzna i dźwiękowa. Jedyna rzecz, która mnie niesamowicie denerwuje to durny system oceniania. Grając w gry logiczne nie mam najmniejszej ochoty czuć presji tego, że nie ukończyłem danego poziomu tak szybko, jak to było możliwe. Poza tym - naprawdę polecam.

23247731.review: I must say, I bought this game with a bit of concerns, but it's a blast. I enjoy every moment. Great puzzle game, great graphics, and amazing sounds which adds to the athmosphere.Overall, 4.5/5

23245175.review: Amazeing game, heard Jesper was makeing a game and got excited. When it was released I bought it immediatly and started playing. This game has a lot of intersesting mechanics that are easy to learn and simple to use.

23243927.review: Grat puzzle game. Music and the idea is great. Worth a buy for a $5 and if your looking for a relaxing puzzle game.

23243618.review: Game is very fun, The learning curve is great. Only complaint is that the teleporters are indistinguishable to tell where you are going.

23243124.review:
Great concept, amazing execution.

ZeGame is everything you'd want from a minimalistic puzzle game. Strong design, intuitive controls, smooth gameplay, surreal soundtrack, you name it. The puzzle difficulty is *just right*, so that you can play for hours on end without getting bored.

I absolutely love the smoothness of the game's controls, and how easy it is to move around (once you get the hang of it). The backgrounds and audio are very relaxing, inviting you to move at your own pace. The design of the blocks is another plus, carrying just enough detail to look unique, yet not enough to ruin the minimalistic style.

If you like simple, intuitive, or innovative games, I'd strongly recomming trying out ZeGame.

23241771.review:
Picked this up after it was tweeted about by the wonderful Marc Watson (and thank you to him for the key! <3). It's a very nice, simple but challenging game with world and level selections similar to games like Cut the Rope (where you have a world, then a selection of levels in the world). Currently there's 8 worlds, and if each world has 40 levels like world 1, then you've got 320 levels to break your brain in. There's also a level editor and downloader, in case that wasn't enough. You've got a 360 degree scope and you can move in 2D directions. The controls do take a bit of getting used to (as you sometimes think you can move in 3D but you can't) but it doesn't take too long.

Essentially, you're a little green block and you have to absorb blue ones. Simple, right? It is, until the levels get quite challenging. There's your tl;dr.

Highly recommended.

23240529.review:
ZeGame is a 3D puzzle game with a simple design and challenging puzzles.
It adds new elements to levels as you progress. Some puzzles can be solved in just 10 seconds without thinking about it but there are levels where you are required to plan your way to finish.
For 4,99 € you are getting a great game with a level editor and in my opinion it's worth it.

This game is now one of my favourite puzzle games of all time and I would recommend it to anyone who likes a little challenge.

23239361.review:
I love a good puzzle game, and ZeGame is a very good puzzle game.  The concept is simple-yet-innovative, the controls are intuitive, and the design is soothing. When I first downloaded ZeGame, I only meant to play long enough to get a feel for the environment.  Several hours later, I was fully immersed in solving a particularly frustrating level.

Level progression is well thought out, introducing new concepts in each of the eight worlds, then gradually increasing difficulty as you progress through the world's twenty levels.  If you make it to the end of it, you are left feeling both triumphant and shell-shocked, and you probably don't care that you didn't achieve three stars on every level (there's a time component in the scoring!), or that you weren't able to complete all the levels without 'dying'.  Or you do care, and you're going to be in for quite a challenge.

23239302.review:
Really beautiful and relaxing puzzle game.
Not too too hard nor too easy.
Enjoyed every single hour of beta testing and will keep enjoying it in the future with more to complete ;)
I recommend playing this game if you love puzzles.

23239242.review:
This is a fairly interesting little puzzle game. The Steam page actually undersells it a little, as in addition to moving in 360 degrees, there are a number of different mechanics slowly released throughout the game that keep in fresh, such as moving multiple blocks at once, portals, and more. The thing that makes this a really great package though, is that there is a level editor with a pretty thriving community for such a small game. For 4 quid, it is a great buy.

For a full review, check here - http://www.voletic.com/reviews/zegame-review-pc/

23239201.review:
In dem Trailer sah ich ein simples Puzzelspiel mit großen Möglichkeiten. Ich erwartete schon etwas nettes, aber nix all zu tolles. Allerdings wurden meine Erwartungen um alles übertroffen was ich gedacht hatte. Nach den ersten 3min war ich sofort gefesselt. Nun nach 30min gönn ich mir eine kleine Pause. Ich bin dann mal wieder weiter ZeGame spielen gehen.

Eine definitive Empfehlung!

Vielen Dank für dieses tolle Spiel!

23239191.review: It is a fun, but can be challenging game. The first world seems easy enough, then it starts getting drastically more difficult. It is a nice 3D challenge.

23239164.review:
ZeGame is beautiful and elegant.  The simplicity of design is pleasing to the eye, while the music soothes your brain... Having lulled you into a calm and happy place, it will then make you rage!  After the rage comes the euphoric satisfaction of having beaten the increasingly sadistic, yet clever, level design.

Once you have conquered the game, you can turn your hand to creating your own devilishly challenging levels and sharing them with the community.

In short, it is everything you want in a puzzle game! BUY IT. :D

23238905.review: So, SO beutiful. Ohhhhh, the graphics! Very very nice.

23238404.review:
TV told you ZeGame is just a game with blocks that you move around and try to get into a blue block.
TV lied, man.
This game is a whole lot more than you think it is. It has everything you need and want. Lots of interesting mechanics? Check. Level editor? Check. Difficulty? Check. Beautiful backgrounds? Check. Awesome music? Check. Post-game mode? Check.
This is a game.
This is the game.
This is ZeGame.

23238313.review:
If you ask me to describe ZeGame for you, I'd say that it's one of the best puzzle games in gaming history.
With it's beautiful and clever design, it creates an overwhelming atmosphere for the player to solve the 160 well designed and challenging puzzles.
Using it's own ingame-editor you can live your creativity and share it with the world. I had a lot of fun playing ZeGame.  btw, the name alone is a reason for itself to play ZeGame :P
